name: Mexican Macaroni and Cheese
description: A healthier alternative to pre-packaged foods, and ready just as quickly.
preparation: Brown beef in a frying pan.
Add macaroni, Mac & Cheese Seasoning, milk, tomatoes, Poco Salsa Mix, Taco Seasoning and water. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring
Place in a serving bowl and top with cheddar. Serve warm.

products.name: Mac & Cheese Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: An all-time best-seller, this is the Mac & Cheese you’ve been craving – and that your kids will LOVE to eat! Creamy, cheesy, and super comforting, it’s free of unnecessary additives and packed with flavour thanks to real cheddar cheese. Take it from the stovetop (or microwave) to the table in under 10 minutes and dig in!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.
